summary: Warmer Conversions of the Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit.  Current conversions:  UNPB HDT & CBBE Curvy HDT.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=2]
[/size][/font][center][font=Verdana][size=2][img]http://i.imgur.com/jem5dci.png[/img]
Current conversions: UNPB HDT & CBBE Curvy HDT.[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][/font][/center][font=Verdana]
[size=2]I liked DC Sorceress's potential for a Keith Parkinson or Conan world style outfit.  That was my only rational going into this, as I have yet to play Atlus' Dragon's Crown.  Anyway, the[/size][size=2]se are warmer conversions of the Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit.  I've made a few subtle changes that make the clothing cover "things" a bit more.  It's Skyrim. Keep warm! [/size]

Happy adventuring!

- Larsepan (Karupisu)

[/font][color=#073763][color=#666666]============================================================[/color][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pyrxzE3.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11767/?]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP[/url] by Backsteppo


[color=#073763][color=#666666]============================================================[/color][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pWLQvCn.png[/img][color=#073763][color=#666666]
[/color][/color]
Install Instructions:
1) Use Nexus Mod Manager (or)
2) Unzip and drop the "Data" folder into your
"Skyrim" folder.

Uninstall Instructions:
1) Use NMM again (or)
2) Delete/overwrite the files in their respective paths.
[color=#073763]
[color=#666666]============================================================[/color][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yzEm7T5.png[/img]

- clipping - high calf back of dress while running.
- the hat needs a few changes...

[color=#073763][color=#666666]============================================================[/color][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bP5gFKP.png[/img]

- The excellent original work by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/657472/?]Backsteppo[/url].
- Nifskope 2, Paint.net, Photoshop, and the fantastic [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide
and Outfit Studio[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/?]Ousnius[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url].

[color=#073763][color=#666666]============================================================[/color][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TTHrRZG.png[/img]

2016.5.21 - 1.1 - CBBE Curvy HDT Release.
2016.5.19 - 1.0.3 - Fixed UNPB mesh clippings, cloth around hands. Etc.
2016.5.17 - 1.0.2 - UNPB Shoes Added.
2016.5.15 - 1.0.1 - Textures fixed.
2016.5.14 - 1.0 - UNPB HDT Release.
author: Larsepan
